## ScriptingSystem.getScriptObjects() method

Get all script instances attached to a host.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getScriptObjects<T extends RuntimeScript<any>>(host: unknown): T[];
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

host


</td><td>

unknown


</td><td>

The host whose scripts to retrieve.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

T\[\]

Script instances attached to the host, or an empty array if none.
